name: HYPERCONTENTICA
description:
Welcome to Neuraverse...
Error! Your premium subscription plan has expired.
In order to continue to your application, please participate in an advertisement experience personalized just for you.
…We wish you a wonderful time!

HYPERCONTENTICA
[hy-per-con-ten-ti-ca] noun
The state of being overly saturated with content, advertisements, and useless information.

A short thriller / psychological horror game about the dangers of the metaverse.

[ Controls: WASD to move; Mouse to look around and click. ]

*** [ WARNING! ] This game contains bright, flashing imagery that may cause discomfort and/or seizures for those with photosensitive epilepsy. Player discretion is advised. ***

Soundtrack produced by Andy Morin. All credit goes to him.

[ HEADPHONES RECOMMENDED ]
